remarks: Non-transitive condition for the covers relation.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jun-2012.)
statement:
ltltncvr.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ltltncvr.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
ltltncvr.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
ltcvrntr $p |- ( ( K e. A /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .< Y /\ Y C Z ) -> -. X C Z ) ) $.
